task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Default
changelist.comment: set attribute property defaults for mutable, required, type and pattern

task.summary: set attribute property defaults for mutable, required, type and pattern
fix to resetting of OCCI model
moved entity initialization from kind and mixin to category
changed default initializer for category
changed initialization of entitiy to allow instantiation without content
removed storage definition from OpenNebula templates
added related_to? method to category
added applicable actions to entity and improved attribute verification
reverted kind to previous version
reverted mixin to previous version
moved applicable actions from resource to entity as it can be used for link as well
removed custom initializer for link
small fix for parsing model directories if trailing slash is omitted. Also preparations for HTML renderer using HAML
rewrote OpenNebula backend to be compatible with refactoring of OCCI server
added rSpec tests for initialization of OpenNebula model
removed leading whitespaces in collection.erb as they mess up the rendering
added erubis and haml gems to gemfile
improved OpenNebula configuration section with model definitions and better directory structure
removed state machine, as applicable actions are now directly added to entities by the backend
moved opennebula and ec2 back into their own folder
fixed several bugs in OpenNebula classes
changed location of opennebula and ec2 in backend manager
updated opennebula and general OCCI model
moved location method from category to kind and mixin. mixin has now an own top level location to allow for kinds and mixins with the same term
added convert_value fix to link and resource
removed applicable_actions variable from entities. it is now done dircetly through the hash key action
location is now correctly taken from category within OCCI Registry
added debug information to request parsing
fix for OCCI Server URI retrieval in Resource creation
deleted outdated opennebula extensions
text/plain rendering now only presents locations for collections. text/uri-list only returns locations for collections and nothing for specific entities
removed refresh method from backends
fixed and improved action handling in dummy and opennebula backend
small fixes to entity regarding attribute checking and location definition
small fixes to OCCI Server regarding action handling
fixed handling of additional parameters for actions (e.g. size) in OCCI Server and dummy backend
fixed link rendering for text/plain
added scenarios for creating storage and invoking actions
removed ruby 1.8.7 from travis CI tests for now. Therefore only ruby >= 1.9.2 is supported
fixed wrong attribute type for network
fix for Ruby 1.8.7
removed outdated css and js from public directory
removed old version of noVNC
restructuring of parser to prepare the code for a separation of generic OCCI stuff into a library, server code into rocci-server and client code into rocci-client
removed all files which are unnecessary for a generic OCCI ruby gem. Added a Ruby gemspec file and a file holding the version of the gem.
removed ANTLR submodule to replace it with subtree
removed occi server spec as it is not needed for OCCI gem
updated rakefile to include Bundler tasks
bumped version to 2.0.0 to align with existing OCCI gem which has version 1.x.x
Readme cleanup. Removed server related parts.
added Ruby 1.8.7 testing with Travis again
further cleanup of unneccessary code for OCCI gem
version bump to 2.0.1
further cleanup and version bump to 2.0.2
version bump to 2.0.2

removed vnc extension as it is not needed for the OCCI gem
improved handling of id, title and summary in entity and resource

added generic OCCI file to require all classes of the gem

removed copyright message in OCCI.g as it is not reflecting the true copyright of the code. This grammar was entirely written by Florian Feldhaus. Only the examples are related to a grammar version copyrighted by Intel.
improved requiring of dependencies
moved some code from OCCI server over to logger to make it a standalone logger
improved description on how to use the OCCI gem
moved collection from OCCI::Core to OCCI and improved documentation and handling of collections

added .project file to .gitignore
improved yardopts file
cleanup of Gemfile

added activesupport as dependency to gemspec
minor wording change in Readme

updated OCCI Log scenario

changed model to be initialized. This allows other classes to contain more than one model.

changed handling of attribute properties. They now start with an uppercase letter (e.g. Type instead of type) to allow a clear distinction between attribute names and attribute properties.

* implemented a somewhat cleaner way to update headers in get
minor change to logger
another change to logger
OCCI Client: in get() fixed category parsing for text/plain
DSL example: made endpoint a constant and some formatting

OCCI Client: changed retrieval of os and resource templates
retrieval of os and resource templates is now done by looking them up in the model instead of retrieving them from the service provider. This solves problems with the way the OpenStack implementation interprets the request.
entity: fixed text rendering
OCCIANTLR: fixed parsing of category attribute properties
OCCIANTLR: adapted parser spec to changes in grammar
Client: fixed problem with os and resource template retrieval
Entity: small fix to text rendering
OCCI ANTLR grammar: fixed wrong type name categories to kind for links
spec: fixed parser spec which was wrong and let to problems with link parsing
Gem: added i18n gem to gemfile and gemspec
Version: minor bump
Parser: small fix to link parsing in text/occi format
Version: minor bump
OCCI ANTLR Parser: fixed parsing of quoted strings
Version: minor bump
Parser: fixed access to target for links rendered inline of resources
Version: minor version bump
Parser spec: changed handling of quoted strings in parser spec for text rendering
Rendering: added rendering to HTTP header to support text/occi until this finally gets removed
Rendering: small fixes to header rendering for links within entity
Rendering: more fixes to header rendering for links within entity
Version: minor bump
Entity: fix to rendering of actions in text/plain and text/occi rendering
Version: minor bump
Entity: small fix to header rendering
Version: minor bump

Parser: fix to OVF parsing when supplied file does not exist
Parser does not return invalid links when a file specified in the OVF file does not exist in an OVA package.
Version: minor bump
Entity: small fix for text and occi rendering
Author: added Boris to the list of authors
README: updated readme with changes to Occi naming
gemspec: updated gemspec with new dependecies

General - changed OCCI to Occi - improved rendering of OCCI objects into plain text, http headers and JSON objects - improved handling of OCCI Attribute Properties
Client - get Resource from Model instead of from fixed hash - added method to deploy OVF/OVA files
Category - added factory method to get ruby class from OCCI category type identifier
ID - changed entity IDs from UUID Strings to the UUID URN format
Occi / Core / Infrastructure - added methods to get kinds, mixins, actions and categories from namespaces - all OCCI Kinds and Mixins are now Ruby classes - added OCCI Infrastructure categories as classes with methods to simplify handling them
Model / Collection - changed model to inherit from collection - removed categories and locations from model - new methods for getting categories by ID or location implemented in collection
Version - bumped Version to 3.0.0-alpha.1
OCCI ANTLR - added parsing of OCCI Attribute Properties mutable and required

Version
- changed to 3.0.0 to be gemspec compliant

gemspec
- removed dependencies which are already in the ruby standard library

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into plugfest-results
Conflicts: lib/occi/core/entity.rb

Model
- removed unnecessary require statements

rspec
- fixed requires in spec files

rspec
- fixed requires in spec files

Gems
- added rubygems to required gems

Category
- fix for ruby 1.8.7 when checking for existing constants

Example
- updated examples regarding storagelink and networkinterface

Documentation
- improved documentation of core classes

Entity
- fixed rendering of occi.core.id

Entity
- fixed rendering of occi.core.id - fixed rendering of links

Resource
- fixed link rendering

Link
- removed creation of ID

Collection
- fixed handling of links in collection

Parser
- fixed parsing of links when only one resource is provided in request

Parser
- fixed parsing of mixins

Link and Resource
- fixed some issues with the initialization of Link and Resource

Version
- minor bump

Gemfile
- updated with latest version of gems

OCCI
- removed empty kind method from occi.rb as it doesn't make sense

OCCI Core functionality
- all kinds and mixins are now ruby objects. If a type identifier is added as kind or mixin to an entity, the corresponding object will be used - improvements to rspec tests - improvements and bug fixes in the OCCI core classes

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:gwdg/rOCCI into core_updates
Conflicts: spec/occi/parser_spec.rb

Mixins
- fixed mixin problem in os_tpl and resource_tpl - added sets to Collection

Categories and Model
- all lists of kinds, actions, mixins, categories and related categories are now specific classes and take care of converting type identifier strings to category instances if they are either implemented as a class in rOCCI or available in the associated model - a model can be added to a collection. Adding it updates all categories in the collection (also within the entities) with the corresponding category from the model. categories not present in the model are currently not removed - added rspec tests for the categories class and updated the tests for category and entity class - several bug fixes

Client
- reverted to previous commit as there was an unintended change
